name: Versus World
description: Welcome to Versus World! Shoot, stab, snipe, and 'splode your opponents to victory in this fast-paced multiplayer FPS. Here, the afterlife of a respawning immortal is seasoned by an up-down crouch.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, 8, 10, 64-bit Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
